definition[0]: inside the area that you can see
example[0]: I glanced around me quickly. There was no one in sight.
example[1]: They burned every house in sight.
example[2]: The boys get home and eat everything in sight.
example[3]: Since my hotel was within sight, I told him he could go.
example[4]: Six months from the start of the strike, there is still no end in sight.
